archimate:Product.name: SocioViz
archimate:Product.documentation: SocioViz: a social media analytics platform powered by Social Network Analysis metrics. Users can scrape the social web from Twitter, analyze any topic, term or hashtag, identify key influencers, opinions and contents and export data. at http://socioviz.net/SNA/eu/sna/login.jsp Registered in order to see how it works- Not convinced
